constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 212 (Wednesday, December 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. WALBERG:
H.R. 6173.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 3 states that Congress shall
have the power to regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and
among several States, and with the Indian tribes.
[Page H7556]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.

title: Protecting International Pipelines for Energy Security Act
